name: G.E.C Marconi Avionics
details: Following GEC's acquisition of Marconi as part of English Electric in 1968, the Marconi brand was used for
its defence businesses, e.g. Marconi Space & Defence Systems (MSDS), Marconi Underwater Systems Ltd (MUSL).
GEC's history of military products dates back to World War I with its contribution to the war effort then including
radios and bulbs. World War II consolidated this position with the company involved in many important technological advances, most notably radar.
tagline: Multinational arms, security, and aerospace company
